content: note pattern page does not seem to be available any more on the knit & crochet today website pattern was featured on knit & crochet today details are available by viewing the episode listing 1 show 205 colorful socks listed as **crochet heart & sole socks** also available at red heart 2 which incorrectly lists the designer 1 http //www knitandcrochetnow com/fly aspx layout=patternsindex&taxid=108 2 http //www redheart com/free-patterns/crochet-heart-sole-socks
